alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Southeast St. Tammany; Upper St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued November 13 at 9:23AM CST until November 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Significant coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Upper St. Bernard, Lower Plaquemines, Lower St. Bernard, Southeast St. Tammany and Eastern Orleans Parishes. In Mississippi, Southern Hancock and Southern Harrison Counties. * WHEN...From this evening through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Orleans; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Southeast St. Tammany; Upper St. Bernard
